name: fractal-ecommerce
description: Full-stack e-commerce application with Django and React

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && python ecom/manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.render-build: pip install -r requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../ecom && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput

author: Kiran Thorat
